resources.string: Think about the different areas appearing on this wheel. How content do you feel in each area? Drag each area to mark from 1 to 10.
Click on the title or any of the section to edit. Don\'t forget to save after you are done
Click on the title or any of the section to edit. After you click on the save button a new wheel will be created

Click on a wheel of interest to you. To create your own wheel click on the menu + button. You can also edit an existing wheel by clicking on the pencil button on it\'s right or delete an existing wheel by clicking on the x button
No help available for this item
Are you sure you\'d like to delete all references of this wheel?
Oops! Could not remove the wheel
Cannot set value to empty text
Cannot set value to more than
When would you like to set the next appointment?
Hi, we have an appointment for today. Please think again about the different areas in this wheel. How content do you feel in each area today?
